mapper.select: SELECT s.apply_num, s.update_time, s.create_time, g.goods_name, a.admin_name, CONCAT(st.stud_address,',',st.stud_room_no) AS address, s.agree FROM stock_out_log s, goods g, admin a, studio st WHERE s.goods_id = g.goods_id AND s.admin_id = a.admin_id AND s.stud_id = st.stud_id AND s.admin_id IS NOT NULL AND s.agree = 0 ORDER BY s.create_time DESC

SELECT s.sto_id, g.goods_id, g.goods_name, g.goods_brand, g.goods_model, s.apply_num, s.create_time, CONCAT(st.stud_address,',',st.stud_room_no) AS address FROM stock_out_log s, studio st, goods g WHERE s.stud_id = st.stud_id AND s.goods_id = g.goods_id AND s.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND st.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND(s.admin_id IS NULL OR s.admin_id = '')

SELECT g.goods_name AS goodsName, SUM( s.apply_num ) AS total FROM goods g, stock_out_log s WHERE s.goods_id = g.goods_id AND s.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND g.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND s.create_time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY g.goods_name
